results.deck: James Bond is a suave British MI6 agent with codename 007 and a license to kill. He is one of the most famous and popular secret agents in Western popular culture.
results.description:
Overview

James Bond is the suave British spy and main protagonist of the James Bond series of novels, movies, and video games. Codenamed "007" (pronounced "double-oh seven"), Bond is one of the top agents of MI6, the British Secret Intelligence Service. He is a Commander of the Royal Navy, has a license to kill, and prefers his martini "shaken, not stirred".
 
Although an expert in the martial arts, James Bond usually brandishes a Walther PPK pistol. (Although he uses a Beretta 418 in the first James Bond movie and Walther P99 in the 1997-2002 movies) To avoid trademark issues, games before Quantum of Solace renamed the Walther PPK to the "Wolfram PP7" and the Walther P99 to either the "Wolfram P2K" or simply the "P99". He also uses a wide variety of gadgets (including the famous high-tech watches) and custom vehicles (including the iconic Aston Martin DB5) from MI6's Q Branch.

Portrayal

Since the debut of the first official James Bond movie, Dr. No, there have been six actors portraying James Bond in films:
 
  • Sean Connery (1962-1967, 1971)
  • George Lazenby (1969)
  • Roger Moore (1973-1985)
  • Timothy Dalton (1987-1989)
  • Pierce Brosnan (1995-2002)
  • Daniel Craig (2006-present)
 
In early video game adaptions, James Bond has been portrayed as a generic man in tuxedo. Beginning with GoldenEye 007 for the Nintendo 64, video game adaptations of the James Bond movies have the likeness (and sometimes voice) of the specific movie actor who portrayed Bond. Pierce Brosnan appeared in the video game adaptations GoldenEye 007, 007: Tomorrow Never Dies, 007: The World Is Not Enough, and 007: Everything or Nothing, as well as the original James Bond games 007: Agent Under Fire and 007: Nightfire. Daniel Craig appeared in the video game adaptation Quantum of Solace, as well as the recreation of GoldenEye 007 and the original James Bond game James Bond 007: Blood Stone. Timothy Dalton's likeness has been used in the cover art for James Bond: The Duel. Sean Connery reprised his role as James Bond in the video game recreation 007: From Russia With Love.
results.name: James Bond

game.name: James Bond 007: A View to a Kill
